title: More sensitive MRI diagnostics thanks to innovative 'elastic' contrast media

title_detail.value: More sensitive MRI diagnostics thanks to innovative 'elastic' contrast media

summary: Researchers have found a new method for obtaining high-quality images in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), that requires less contrast medium compared to current methods.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have found a new method for obtaining high-quality images in magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), that requires less contrast medium compared to current methods.
